patthana8.2:1.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe…
patthana8.2:1.1_1: dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana8.2:1.1_2: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana8.2:1.1_4: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:2.1_0: Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.2:3.1_0: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:3.1_1: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:3.1_2: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana8.2:6.1_0: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.2:6.1_1: Nasahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.2:6.1_2: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa ca naahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.2:7.1_0: Naahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana8.2:8.1_0: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.2:9.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava …pe…
patthana8.2:9.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme …pe…
patthana8.2:9.1_2: jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca …pe…
